questions.question: Are you licensed and insured?
questions.answer: Yes, Joe the Painter is a fully licensed C33 Painting and Decorating contractor (CA Lic. # 802167) and is fully insured for your peace of mind. You can verify the license directly with the California Contractors State License Board (CSLB) at [cslb.ca.gov](https://www.cslb.ca.gov/OnlineServices/CheckLicenseII/LicenseDetail.aspx?LicNum=802167).

questions.question: What areas do you serve?
questions.answer: Joe the Painter proudly serves homeowners and small businesses across **Central and North San Diego County**, including Carlsbad, Encinitas, Vista, San Marcos, Oceanside, Escondido, Poway, Rancho Bernardo, Del Mar, and Solana Beach.

questions.question: How do I get a free estimate?
questions.answer: Getting a free, no-obligation estimate is easy! Simply fill out our 'Book a Free Consultation' form on any page, or call Joe directly at `(760) 580-8173`. Joe will personally discuss your project and schedule a convenient time for an on-site assessment.

questions.question: What are your operating hours?
questions.answer: Joe the Painter typically operates Monday through Friday, from 8:00 AM to 5:00 PM. Project scheduling can be flexible to accommodate your specific needs, so please discuss your preferred times during your consultation.
